sprint_goal: Establish the foundational user registration and secure login flows, including core validation and error handling.
Complete the account activation loop with email verification and implement secure session termination (logout).
Implement the complete, secure self-service password recovery user journey.
Implement Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA) setup and login to provide enhanced account security.
Implement temporary account deactivation and seamless reactivation to improve user retention and control.
This sprint is overloaded and should be split. Initial Goal: Implement the complete, compliant permanent account deletion workflow and the user-facing security audit trail.
